column2: "Oh, hello <%me>. Did you see that announcement on the monitor? That was really something."
"That person is from the Council of Six right? They're really high up on the social ladder."
"Somehow it really seemed like he enjoyed talking down to everyone."
"There's going to be an idol performing as well."
"I'd really like to go and have fun too."
"Don't worry I won't. From my headache before Philia got really angry for over doing myself."
"So please, <%me> have enough fun for the both of us."
